name: Planned Assault
book: Pathfinder Companion: Dwarves of Golarion. Copyright 2009, Paizo Publishing, LLC
area: one creature/level, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart
text:
This spell increases the effectiveness of a planned action. If the targets spend at least 1 minute studying a situation, they receive bonuses to their first actions in response to the situation. All targets must declare in advance what their intended actions are. If they perform those actions, they receive a +2 sacred bonus to AC, saving throws, and checks for the first round. This bonus increases to +4 at 10th level and +6 at 15th level.

For example, the PCs discover a camp of orcs; the PC cleric casts planned assault, the group spends 1 minute analysing the layout of the camp, and then declares its actions. As long as the PCs stick to the plan, they gain a +2 sacred bonus to AC, saving throws, and all actions for the first round.
area_zh: 一个生物/等级，彼此不能相距超过30呎
duration_zh: 1分钟/等级 或 直至发散
text_zh: 这个法术会增加一个有计划的行动的效率。如果目标花费至少1分钟来研究一种情形，他们就会在应对该情况的第一个行动上获得加值。所有的目标必须事先声明他们的意图。如果他们执行这些动作，他们在第一轮中将在防御等级、豁免、和检定上获得+2的神圣加值。10级时加值将提升到+4，15级时提升为+6。 例如，PC发现了一个兽人营地；PC牧师施展了预谋突袭，小队花了1分钟来分析营地的布局，然后宣布了他们的行动。只要PC们贯彻计划，在第一轮中，他们会得到+2的士气加值，包括在防御等级、豁免检定、和所有的动作上。
